tool_description: Processes performance metrics against configured thresholds to generate alerts, supporting complex rule logic and alert suppression mechanisms.

current_metrics.description: Array of current metric values to evaluate

metric_names.description: Names corresponding to each metric value

threshold_configs.description: Array of threshold configuration IDs from Threshold Manager

enable_alert_grouping.description: Whether to group similar alerts together

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: current_metrics and metric_names must have the same length.
Invalid threshold configs: One or more threshold configuration IDs are invalid.
Empty input arrays: All required arrays must contain at least one element.
Invalid suppression window: Window must be between 60 and 3600 seconds.
No matching thresholds: No threshold configurations match the provided metrics.
usage: Provide current_metrics, metric_names, and threshold_configs from previous tools. Configure suppression settings as needed. Returns alert generation results.

suppressed_alerts.description: Number of alerts that were suppressed

highest_severity.description: Highest severity level among generated alerts

requires_immediate_attention.description: Whether any critical alerts require immediate attention
